## MySQLConnectionOptions interface

Database connection options.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MySQLConnectionOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [authSwitchHandler](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.authswitchhandler.md) | <code>AuthSwitchHandler</code> | Authentication switch handler. |
|  [bigNumberStrings](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.bignumberstrings.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Determines if big number values are always returned as strings even if the value fits in a <code>Number</code>. |
|  [charset](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.charset.md) | <code>string</code> | Collation for the connection. |
|  [charsetNumber](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.charsetnumber.md) | <code>number</code> | Collation ID for the connection. |
|  [compress](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.compress.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Use compressed protocol (recommended). |
|  [connectAttributes](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.connectattributes.md) | <code>{</code><br/><code>        [attName: string]: string;</code><br/><code>    }</code> | Connection attributes. |
|  [connectTimeout](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.connecttimeout.md) | <code>number</code> | Milliseconds before a timeout occurs during the initial connection to the MySQL server. |
|  [database](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.database.md) | <code>string</code> | Database name. |
|  [dateStrings](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.datestrings.md) | <code>false</code> | Return date values as strings instead of converting them to <code>Date</code> objects. |
|  [debug](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.debug.md) | <code>boolean</code> | If <code>true</code>, the underlying module prints debug information to the console. |
|  [decimalNumbers](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.decimalnumbers.md) | <code>false</code> | Return <code>DECIMAL</code> values as numbers instead of strings. |
|  [flags](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.flags.md) | <code>string</code> | Comma-separated list of connection flags to add or to remove (if flag is prefixed with a minus sign) to/from the default flags. |
|  [host](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.host.md) | <code>string</code> | Database host. |
|  [insecureAuth](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.insecureauth.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Unused (the underlying module does not use this functionality). |
|  [localAddress](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.localaddress.md) | <code>string</code> | Unused (the underlying module does not use this functionality). |
|  [maxPreparedStatements](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.maxpreparedstatements.md) | <code>number</code> | Maximum number of cached prepared statements. |
|  [multipleStatements](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.multiplestatements.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Irrelevant (the framework does not use this functionality of the underlying module). |
|  [namedPlaceholders](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.namedplaceholders.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Irrelevant (the framework does not use this functionality of the underlying module). |
|  [nestTables](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.nesttables.md) | <code>false</code> | Nest columns in table objects in result sets. |
|  [password](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.password.md) | <code>string</code> | Database user password. |
|  [passwordSha1](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.passwordsha1.md) | <code>Buffer</code> | SHA-1 digest of the database user password. |
|  [port](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.port.md) | <code>number</code> | Database port. |
|  [rowsAsArray](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.rowsasarray.md) | <code>false</code> | Return rows are arrays instead of objects. |
|  [socketPath](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.socketpath.md) | <code>string</code> | Path to a Unix domain socket to connect to. |
|  [ssl](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.ssl.md) | <code>&quot;Amazon RDS&quot; &#124; SecureContextOptions</code> | SSL options for the database connection. |
|  [stream](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.stream.md) | <code>Duplex &#124; ((cb: (err: Error &#124; null, stream?: Duplex) =&gt; void) =&gt; void)</code> | Stream to use for the connection, or a function that provides the stream. |
|  [stringifyObjects](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.stringifyobjects.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Irrelevant (the framework does not use this functionality of the underlying module). |
|  [supportBigNumbers](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.supportbignumbers.md) | <code>false</code> | Determines if numbers returned from the database that do not fit in JavaScript's <code>Number</code> are represented as strings instead. |
|  [timezone](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.timezone.md) | <code>string</code> | MySQL server's timezone. |
|  [trace](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.trace.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Unused (the underlying module does not use this functionality). |
|  [typeCast](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.typecast.md) | <code>true &#124; TypeCastFunc</code> | Determines how column values are converted into JavaScript types. |
|  [uri](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.uri.md) | <code>string</code> | Database URI. |
|  [user](./db-connection-mysql.mysqlconnectionoptions.user.md) | <code>string</code> | Database user name. |

## Remarks

This is mostly the [mysql2](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mysql2) module connection configuration object with some farmework specific constraints.

<em>Note, that only own properties are effective.</em>
